summary: Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.
cast: James Marsden|Thomas Jane|Piper Perabo|Scott Glenn|Michaela McManus|Billy Bob Thornton|Adam Beach|Kelly Curran|Reese Alexander|Luisa d'Oliveira|Sean Owen Roberts|Bill Croft|Mariel Belanger|Mark Acheson|Michael Jonsson|Patrick Sabongui|Garry Chalk|Alvin Sanders|Sarah Desjardins|Carson Reaume|Seth Isaac Johnson|Bart the Bear
title: Territorio Grizzly
